ovdesc.p: IS.CONTRACT.TASK is the table to define the actions/tasks that could be performed as purchase of an asset.
These task could be verification task or generic task for a purchase. The user can define any number of tasks for a purchase.

desc.p: The actions or tasks performed as part of the purchase. These are specified in the Purchase contract to form a checklist of tasks.
The ID of the application IS.CONTRACT.TASK is any standard text.
Contains all the override messages which the user has confirmed during input.

During Commit, the system may generate a series of screen override messages waiting for User Approval. If the record is subsequently displayed or printed, all override messages are shown in this field.
